title: TOP 5 Best Vacuum Cleaners 2025
relevance: Most relevant video studied — nearly identical to the Rayviews production format. Fully faceless, manufacturer B-roll with clean text overlays, TTS-style voiceover, Amazon affiliate links. Every visual element maps 1:1 to our pipeline (Dzine AI, DaVinci Resolve, ElevenLabs).
summary: Top 5 vacuum cleaners for 2025 using fully faceless B-roll compilation format. No presenter on camera. All footage is manufacturer B-roll with clean white sans-serif text overlays highlighting features and specs. Fast cuts (3-5s per clip), ~1.5 min per product. Description uses numbered list with affiliate links (amzn.to + geni.us).

key_insights.insight: Fully faceless B-roll compilation format — no presenter on camera, entire video is manufacturer promo footage with text overlays and TTS voiceover. This IS the Rayviews format.

Clean white sans-serif text overlays with decorative line/arrow elements for feature callouts. Positioned upper-left or center-left, 2-5 words max, on screen 2-3 seconds. Should become the Rayviews standard template.
Fast clip pacing: 3-5 seconds per B-roll clip, continuous visual flow with no pauses. ~15-20 visual changes per minute keeps engagement high.
Search-bar-style title card with hand cursor icon — mimics a Google search to imply 'I searched so you don't have to.' Smart trust-building hook worth adapting.
All footage is manufacturer B-roll (promo videos, lifestyle demos, product close-ups). Dzine AI can replicate this exactly — no Amazon screenshots, no webcam, no screen recordings.

Spec numbers in overlays ('450 Watt Motor', '15,000 Times per Second', 'Retractable 30 Foot Cord') drive perceived authority through specificity. Research pipeline already extracts these — should flow into overlay templates.
Description uses numbered list with checkmark emojis, product name, 'Check Prices' text, and short affiliate links. Mix of amzn.to and geni.us formats. Amazon Associates disclosure at bottom.
No talking head means full end-to-end automation is possible — no Lip Sync needed, no avatar consistency issues, no character management overhead. Simpler pipeline path.

editing_style.transitions: hard cuts only — no dissolves, wipes, or animated transitions
editing_style.text_overlays: clean white sans-serif with decorative line/arrow elements, 2-5 words, upper-left or center-left, on screen 2-3 seconds over action footage
editing_style.graphics: search-bar-style title card with cursor icon; decorative brackets/lines on feature text
editing_style.pacing: fast — 3-5s per clip, ~1.5 min per product, continuous visual flow, no dead air
editing_style.camera_work: no camera — all manufacturer B-roll footage
editing_style.product_presentation: manufacturer B-roll: promo videos, lifestyle demos (living room, hardwood floors), product close-ups, feature highlights with text overlays
editing_style.structure: title card (search bar) → [manufacturer B-roll + feature text overlays] x5 → closing
editing_style.effects: none visible — occasional slow zoom on static product shots

production_budget_estimate.note: 5 products x 5 images x 40 credits (4K) = 1000 image credits; 5 products x 3 video clips x ~70 credits (Minimax Hailuo 2.3) = 1050 video credits; no Lip Sync needed (faceless format)

description_format.header: Best Vacuum Cleaner 2025 | Links To Products
description_format.link_format: product name followed by 'Check Prices' with short link
description_format.disclosure: Amazon Associates Program disclosure paragraph at bottom

action_items.action: Create DaVinci Resolve Fusion template for feature text overlays: white sans-serif + decorative line elements, upper-left positioning, 2-3s duration
Build automated timeline assembly: alternate Dzine product images (3-5s each) with text overlay keyframes pulled from products.json specs
Create search-bar-style title card template for video intros (category name as search query + cursor icon)
Add rank number overlay (#1-#5) and product name lower-third as competitive advantage over this channel
Extract spec numbers from products.json research data and auto-generate text overlay list for each product segment
Adopt description format: numbered checkmark list with product name + 'Check Prices' + amzn.to link + Associates disclosure

analysis_meta.transcript_note: Analysis based on visual frame sampling
